desc: Bold Candle Co. delivers premium coconut wax candles you can actually smell without all the chemicals. Our candles are made using a premium blend of natural Coconut wax & Apricot oil. Our candles are 100% non-toxic, sustainable, phthalate free, hand poured in the USA, and supreme in comparison to any soy wax candles.

layout.text: Luxury quality candles you can actually smell (without all the chemicals).
Our premium natural, coconut wax blends provide 60 hours of clean, slow burn-time and radiate 50% more scent than even the best soy candles on the market.
